base_description: Analyzing the topology, we find 9 nodes and 13 branches in this circuit. For passive elements, the circuit contains 8 resistive element(s). Energy is supplied through 3 voltage source(s), 1 current source(s). Additionally, 1 controlled source(s) are present. Measurement setup includes 2 voltage measurement(s), 1 current measurement(s). In total, this circuit comprises 13 circuit elements.

edits.instruction: Adjust the DC voltage source 2 parameter from 84V to 42V.
